item.title: VolgaCTF - excellent-crackme
item.description: Prompt Excellent Crackme We know one can do pretty much everything in Excel spreadsheets, but this… excel_crackme Solution An excel challenge – that’s a first for us! Let’s crack that file open. We used LibreOffice, as Excel was not installed and Libreoffice was. Upon opening, we are greeted with a message that mentions that macros will not be run for security reasons. we’ll look into that in a sec, thank you, LibreOffice.
